# MPMusicRepeatMode.none

**Case**

The music player will not repeat the current song or playlist.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Constants

- **MPMusicRepeatMode.default**: The user’s preferred repeat mode.
- **MPMusicRepeatMode.one**: The music player will repeat the current song.
- **MPMusicRepeatMode.all**: The music player will repeat the current playlist.
